statements: DELETE FROM musician_statistics WHERE musician_id = 123 AND musician_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM music_stats WHERE musician_id = 3 AND download_count > 100;
DELETE FROM music_stats WHERE stream_count > 1000 AND download_count < 500;
DELETE FROM statistics WHERE song_id = 10 AND stream_count > 100;
DELETE FROM Songs WHERE musician_id = (SELECT musician_id FROM Musicians WHERE musician_name = 'John Doe') AND song_id IN (SELECT song_id FROM Songs WHERE release_date < '2022-01-01')
DELETE FROM Downloads WHERE song_id = 5 AND device_type = 'iPhone';
